== Video Overview ==

Show how to use the Screen application to start and run processes on the server that need to keep running after you log out.   

== Target Audience ==

This is of interest to System administrators and to Users who run their own server at home.

== Pre-requisites ==
The screen application needs to be installed on the server

== Required Knowledge ==
You have to be able to open a terminal window and to use the commandline. 

== Recommended Knowledge ==

== Objectives ==
To show how Screen can make your system admin tasks easier
